South_San_Francisco.Peninsula Temple Sholom: Peninsula Temple Sholom (PTS) is a Reform Jewish Congregation in Burlingame, California. It was founded in 1955, and since then, has constantly grown its congregation and has expanded its facilities to include a social hall, a Religious School and a Preschool. For five decades, its services have been led by Rabbi Gerald Raiskin, who had changed the legacy and history of the temple until his passing in 2006.
